Lyric:
[by:JustNilk]
[00:08:33]It’s another bad dream
[00:12:21]Poison in my bloodstream
[00:16:11]I’m dying but I can’t scream
[00:20;00]Will you show me the way?
[00:23:00]It’s another wolf bite
[00:27:32]howling in the moon light
[00:30:02]I wanna get my life right
[00:34:90]Will you show me the way tonight?
[00:53:00]If the darkness falls
[00:55:00]And my angel calls
[00:58:00]In my despair
[01:00:00]Will you be there?
[01:01:03]In the darkest night
[01:03:22]When I need your light
[01:04:45]Will you show me the way?
[01:08:55]If my time runs out
[01:10:70]And the sky falls down
[01:12:92]Despite my fear
[01:15:22]Will you appear?
[01:16:55]If the world goes blind
[01:18:22]And I lose my mind
[01:19:55]Will you show me the way tonight?
[01:26:73]Will you show me the way tonight?
[01:34:56]Will you show me the way tonight?
[01:41:84]It’s another nightmare
[01:45:23]I swear there’s something out there
[01:49:14]So save me ‘cause I’m so scared
[01:53:50]Will you show me the way?
[01:57:03]It’s another werewolf
[02:00:69]All dressed up in sheep’s wool
[02:03:88]and changing when the moon’s full
[02:08:32]Will you show me the way?
[02:12:73]If the darkness falls
[02:13:95]And my angel calls
[02:16:03]In my despair
[02:18:22]Will you be there?
[02:19:89]In the darkest night
[02:21:57]When I need your light
[02:23:32]Will you show me the way?
[02:27:03]If my time runs out
[02:28:81]And the sky falls down
[02:31:64]Despite my fear
[02:33:67]Will you appear?
[02:35:21]If the world goes blind
[02:36:88]And I lose my mind
[02:38:77]Will you show me the way tonight?
[02:57:65]If the darkness falls
[02:59:36]And my angel calls
[03:01:51]In my despair(Will you show me the way?)
[03:02:96]Will you be there?
[03:03:93]In the darkest night
[03:06:57]When I need your light
[03:08:12]Will you show me the way?
[03:12:02]If my time runs out
[03:14:04]And the sky falls down
[03:16:34]Despite my fear
[03:18:20]Will you appear?
[03:19:73]If the world goes blind
[03:21:54]And I lose my mind
[03:23:43]Will you show me the way tonight?
[03:31:33]In my despair will you be there
[03:34:55]Tonight...
